item.title: [DaVinciCTF 2021 - pwn] Quotebook
item.description: Da Vinci CTF 2021 - Quotebook (499 pts) The subject of this task was: I created this amazing service to store all my famous quotes. Can you get the flag? nc challs.dvc.tf 2222 We are given the binary, the source code for it and the libc used on the server. We’ll need to find a vuln into the binary to get a shell and grab a flag from the server (typical pwn task).
